title: Chermoula Recipe
full_text:
Chermoula Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
12 servings
Makes
1 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
packed
cilantro leaves
1/2
cup
packed
parsley leaves
4
medium
cloves garlic
, peeled
1/4
cup
preserved lemon juice, or
1/3
cup
regular
lemon juice
1
tablespoon
paprika
2
teaspoons
ground cumin
1/2
teaspoon
cayenne
1/8
teaspoon
crushed
saffron
1/2
cup
olive oil
Kosher salt
, to taste
Directions
Place cilantro, parsley, and garlic in the workbowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade. Pulse until all ingredients are finely chopped, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as necessary.
Serious Eats / Joshua Bousel
Add preserved lemon juice, paprika, cumin, cayenne, and saffron and pulse to combine.
Serious Eats / Joshua Bousel
With motor running, drizzle olive through feed tube. Process until sauce is uniform. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to 2 days.
Serious Eats / Joshua Bousel
Special Equipment
Food processor
